publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2250 Elaine Smith: National No School Uniform Day, Friday 21 January 2005—That the Parliament commends the efforts of the Scottish Youth Parliament in promoting a National No School Uniform Day across Scotland on Friday 21 January 2005 in aid of the Disasters Emergency Committee Tsunami Earthquake Appeal; considers that such an event, held simultaneously across the United Kingdom, has the potential to raise considerable sums of money for the aid effort in Asia; welcomes the opportunity it presents for young people to get involved in this cause; congratulates those young people who have been instrumental in the organisation of this event; wishes the initiative every success, and encourages all Scottish schools to consider getting involved. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-2250 Elaine Smith: National No School Uniform Day, Friday 21 January 2005—That the Parliament commends the efforts of the Scottish Youth Parliament in promoting a National No School Uniform Day across Scotland on Friday 21 January 2005 in aid of the Disasters Emergency Committee Tsunami Earthquake Appeal; considers that such an event, held simultaneously across the United Kingdom, has the potential to raise considerable sums of money for the aid effort in Asia; welcomes the opportunity it presents for young people to get involved in this cause; congratulates those young people who have been instrumental in the organisation of this event; wishes the initiative every success, and encourages all Scottish schools to consider getting involved.
S2M-2250 National No School Uniform Day, Friday 21 January 2005 (lodged on 13 January 2005) Margaret Jamieson*

S2M-2250 National No School Uniform Day, Friday 21 January 2005 (lodged on 13 January 2005) Maureen Macmillan*, Michael Matheson*, Pauline McNeill*, Susan Deacon*, Rosie Kane*, Eleanor Scott*, Karen Whitefield*, Shiona Baird*, Cathie Craigie*, Robert Brown*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Ms Sandra White*, Donald Gorrie*, Mike Pringle*

S2M-2250 National No School Uniform Day, Friday 21 January 2005 (lodged on 13 January 2005) Christine May*, Jackie Baillie*, Robin Harper*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Helen Eadie*, Bruce Crawford*, Michael McMahon*, Scott Barrie*, Janis Hughes*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Carolyn Leckie*, Sarah Boyack*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S2M-2250 National No School Uniform Day, Friday 21 January 2005 (lodged on 13 January 2005) Trish Godman*, David Mundell*
S2M-2250 National No School Uniform Day, Friday 21 January 2005 (lodged on 13 January 2005) Chris Ballance*
S2M-2250 National No School Uniform Day, Friday 21 January 2005 (lodged on 13 January 2005) Irene Oldfather*
S2M-2250 National No School Uniform Day, Friday 21 January 2005 (lodged on 13 January 2005) Dr Jean Turner*
